trans-unit.source: J.COp ML is a machine Learning package to complement scikit-learn workflow
trans-unit.target: J.COp ML是一个机器学习包,用于补充scikit-learn工作流程。

trans-unit.source: J.COp ML is a machine Learning package to complement scikit-learn workflow. It includes helper functions for visualization, tuning, pipeline, and feature importance.
trans-unit.target: J.COp ML是一个机器学习包,用于补充scikit-learn工作流程。它包括可视化、调优、流水线和特征重要性的辅助函数。

trans-unit.source: The project started in July 2018 as a tool to teach machine learning for beginner, but the serious development began in March 2019 together with the initiation of the LuWiji project. Both LuWiji and J.COp ML is developed by Wira D. K. Putra as complementary for his machine learning curriculum for young machine learning enthusiast.
trans-unit.target: 该项目始于2018年7月,是一款面向初学者的机器学习教学工具,但认真开发是从2019年3月开始,同时启动LuWiji项目。LuWiji和J.COp ML都是由Wira D.K.Putra开发的,作为他为年轻机器学习爱好者提供的机器学习课程的补充。
